activities: As a global social media management company we hold third party personal data including the email addresses and telephone numbers of client contacts and employees and from a human resources perspective, we have access to bank account details and other private/personal information about our employees. Our parent company is based in the UK and occasionally information has to be transferred securely to the US subsidiary for operational and account management purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: email addresses, home addresses, telephone numbers, passport details, bank account details, health information
recoursemech: We are registered with JAMS Inc. - Arbitration, Mediation, and ADR Services
